quote_first: From Balboa Island, he drove south to Laguna Beach. At
quote_last: , he parked his van across the street from the Hudston house.

title: $:/litClock/times/-23:20-Rudyard Kipling
quote_first: Harvey looked at the clock, which marked
quote_last: . “Then I’ll sleep here till three and catch the four o'clock freight. They let us men from the Fleet ride free as a rule."
